main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Neustadt, Germany on June 29, 1954. The object was described as oblong, very high altitude, very fast, whitish-gray in color, and oval to disc-like in shape.
interesting points: Multiple German persons observed the UFO for a short period of time.
The sighting report includes witness observations and details.
No photograph is included in the report.
The object was observed at a very high altitude and was moving very fast.
The color of the object was described as whitish-gray, and its shape was described as oval to disc-like.
